shri lanka krikat athurukamituwe samajikathwayen pramodya wikramasinha mahatha illa aswimata thiranaya kara thibe.pudgalika hethun masa thaman illa aswimata thiranaya kala bawa hethema ada derana kala wimasumakata pilithuru demin kiya sitiyeya. 2011 pawathwannata niyamitha loka kusalana tharangawaliyata adala kisidu thorathurak sambandhayen thaman danuwath kirimak methek kara nomathi bawath,krida amathyawaraya ho janadhipathiwaraya ee sambandhayen yamak wimasa sitiyahoth kiyannata kisi deyak nathi bawath hethema pawasiya.

ee athara shri lanka ramanynya maha nikaya wethin “siri jinawansa dewananda wansalankara saddhammakiththi siri sangha sobhana lokaththachari” yana gaurawa nama sammuthi upaharayen pidum labu kolambaa 07, shri kalyanidharma aashramadhipathi mirihane nanda maha swamin wahansege guna suwandin pobayana nikalal sasun diwiye thathu bindak mese sanituhan karannemu. 1949 juli 17 wana dina nugegoda mirihana gampiyase di haputhanthrige aariyarathna namin janma labhaya labiya. 1960 janawari 01 wana dina athurugiriye bodhirukkharama punya bhumiye di sasun gatha wiya.

amarikanu siwil yuddha samaya aarambhawimath samaga ratapura lingika roga pilibada danuwath kirim wadiwiya.palamu warata lingika aadhyapanaya sadaha podu pasal thula panthi arambaiya.memagin lingikawa sanpreshanayawana roga pilabadawa danumak dabadunha.memagin upath palana kopu prawardhanayak sidu nokala athara bahu sahakaru sewanaya prathikshepa kirimata upades dunha.ek ayaku samaga pamanak lingikawa ekwima sudusu bawa penwa dunha.lingika anacharayata wiruddhawa dadi daduwam dunha.upadansha roginta prathikara kirima atham rohal prathikshepa kalaha.kese wethath mema kramaya etharam sarthaka wisadumak nowiya.awasanaye amarikawatada wisiwana siyawasayen pasu upath palana kopu bhawithaye wadagathkama awabodhawiya.owun wisiwana shathawarshaye patan upath palana kopu walata yomuwima siduwiya.
